name: TravelCheck
description: A simple and intuitive world travel advisory application to help world travelers determine if their destination is safe to travel to.

name: Day Planner
description: A digital day planner where you can input your events and tasks during regular business hours.

name: Harry Potter Quiz
description: An application to test your knowledge of the Harry Potter universe through a timed quiz.

name: Mood Tunes
description: A playlist generator application that allows to you to create a musical time capsule for a specific date or period in the past.

name: Password Generator
description: A password generator application that created secure passwords according to the users desired specifications.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather application for viewing current and future weather conditions in any city.
